value.title: Ever wanted a NOTIFICATION in your Power BI Reports?
value.excerpt: Maybe you want your Power BI report users to get be notified of some changes that occurred. And, you want that displayed within the report. Patrick has a way you can do just that!  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************  Want to take your Power BI skills to the next

value.title: Excel and OneDrive with Power BI For Collaboration
value.excerpt: In this 2 minute Tuesday, Patrick looks at how to use Excel and OneDrive with Power BI For Collaboration. Using this approach, you can easily keep Power BI updated when team members update an Excel spreadsheet hosted on OneDrive. This is a great alternative to using Google Sheets which can be painful

Connect with Tzvia: https://www.linkedin.com/in/tzvia/ https://twitter.com/tzvia  What is Azure Data Explorer? https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/data-explorer/data-explorer-overview

value.title: OData Differences within Power BI and how to refresh your data!
value.excerpt: Last week we looked at the O365 Bubble and how we use Authentication to go in and out.  This week we show it in action!  We will look at one of the limitations to the existing Power BI service and how we can actually use the new Power BI Preview service to refresh data from an OData feed using oAuth
